Class ClearableEditText

java.lang.Object
android.view.View
android.widget.TextView
android.widget.EditText
androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatEditText
eltos.simpledialogfragment.list.ClearableEditText
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.View.OnFocusChangeListener, android.view.View.OnTouchListener, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener, androidx.core.view.TintableBackgroundView
public class ClearableEditText
extends androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatEditText
implements android.view.View.OnTouchListener, android.view.View.OnFocusChangeListener
An edit text with a clear button
